metadata.synopsis: The players arrive to camp and start to settle in:~Party arrives at camp~One party member is clutching their head, walking shakilyanother member is clutching their stomach + collapses on a bedroll, sweating/exhausted~another party member is bleeding from the gums?The player's tadpole is starting to activate, the first indiacation thta they are transforming into a mindflayer. Think the moment when you start to feel nauseus and headachey while fluey.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Add upto 3 companions through debug book- Do NOT have Laezel in party or will play different dialogue- Use OE code:oe qnight NIGHT_DaisyDream1_52669b07-9584-4c9d-8219-49679811fd4f- Go to camp
